info.description: Allows the closure of the portfolio, delinking an account from the portfolio and retrieves the account balance information and valuation information
info.title: API for portfolio management

put.description: Updates the closure date for a portfolio

parameters.name: portfolioId
parameters.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

delete.description: Reverses the portfolio that does not have positions

parameters.name: portfolioId
parameters.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

accountIds.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

account.description: Identifies the unique account Id of the payment entered.

jointHolderId.description: The identifier of the joint holder

jointRelationCode.description: The identifier of the relationship between joint holder and owner

additionalDetail.description: Additional details provided to add context. Closure notes for closed accounts, positing restriction details for restricted accounts & joint holder notes or account title for active accounts

valuationCurrency.description: The currency in which the account or portfolio is valued

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

investmentProgram.description: The identifier of the investment strategy followed by the Portfolio

managedAccount.description: The type of managed account- Discretionary or otherwise

safekeepChargeAccount.description: The cash account to which safe custody charges need to be posted

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

closureDate.description: The date when the Security Account is to be closed

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

transactionStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

accountIds.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

account.description: Identifies the unique account Id of the payment entered.

jointHolderId.description: The identifier of the joint holder

jointRelationCode.description: The identifier of the relationship between joint holder and owner

additionalDetail.description: Additional details provided to add context. Closure notes for closed accounts, positing restriction details for restricted accounts & joint holder notes or account title for active accounts

valuationCurrency.description: The currency in which the account or portfolio is valued

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

investmentProgram.description: The identifier of the investment strategy followed by the Portfolio

managedAccount.description: The type of managed account- Discretionary or otherwise

safekeepChargeAccount.description: The cash account to which safe custody charges need to be posted

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

closureDate.description: The date when the Security Account is to be closed

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

options.description: The usable options for the override

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

assetEstimation.description: Total estimation positions of the portfolio

collateralMarketValue.description: Total market value of the collateral

lombardValue.description: Lombard or collateral value of the portfolio

diversifiedLombardValue.description: Lombard or collateral value of the portfolio after diversification

totalLiability.description: The total liability of the portfolio

netLombardValue.description: The net Lombard value of the portfolio

limitAmount.description: The Limit amount that is actually available for use. The system limit checks are preformed against the online limit

securityMarginPercentage.description: Percentage of margin of the pledged securities

interventionPercentage.description: Percentage of intervention of the Lombard value of the portfolio

realisationPercentage.description: Percentage of realisation of the Lombard value of the portfolio

pledgeBalance.description: The balance of the pledged securities

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from the Security Master

subAssetType.description: The name of the Sub Asset Type

ISIN.description: The International Securities Identification Number of the instrument

marketValue.description: Market value for the associated position

collateralMarketValue.description: Total market value of the collateral

totalLiability.description: The total liability of the portfolio

securityMarginPercentage.description: Percentage of margin of the pledged securities

lombardValue.description: Lombard or collateral value of the portfolio

diversifiedLombardValue.description: Lombard or collateral value of the portfolio after diversification

pricingFlag.description: Indicates if the security is priced

interventionPercentage.description: Percentage of intervention of the Lombard value of the portfolio

interventionAmount.description: Amount of intervention of the Lombard value of the portfolio

realisationPercentage.description: Percentage of realisation of the Lombard value of the portfolio

realisationAmount.description: Amount of realisation of the Lombard value of the portfolio

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

accountName.description: Display name or short name of the account specified.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

accountName.description: Display name or short name of the account specified.

accountCurrency.description: Currency of the account. For example: USD, GBP.

workingBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account and, unless it is a nostro or internal account, unauthorised debit entries.

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

subAccount.description: The sub-account that the security position is held in.

subAcctExtId.description: This is to indicate the external identifier of the sub account maintained with depository

valuationCurrency.description: The currency in which the account or portfolio is valued

accountName.description: Display name or short name of the account specified.

investmentProgram.description: The identifier of the investment strategy followed by the Portfolio

managedAccount.description: The type of managed account- Discretionary or otherwise

valuationAmt.description: This is the valuation amount of the portfolio in reference currency
